question: Do you know when it's Mickey Mouse's birthday?

answers.text: I hate Mickey and hope he dies for eating some tainted cheese alone and forgotten in a soiled bathroom
answers.response: Hey, chill man...
That's my favorite day of the year!

answers.text: Mickey schmicky, I hope you choke on a sticky
answers.response: That's so rude!

question: Who is your favorite Disney princess?

answers.text: Fiona from Shrek is a great princess
answers.response: That's not Disney!

answers.text: Mulan is the only good princess I can think of
answers.response: That's a good choice

answers.text: Let it go, let it go! Can't hold it back anymore!
answers.response: I love Frozen!
*disney nerd is full of evasive dance moves*

question: What do you think of Disney?

answers.text: I miss their hand drawn movies
answers.response: Yeah, I know what you mean. I miss them too

answers.text: I will never forgive them for ruining the Star Wars universe!
answers.response: How can you say that?! *Gets taken aback*
I know right?!?
*disney nerd dodges while dancing*
So cool that Disney distributed Ghibli's movie!
Pokémon is not made by Disney! *angry face*

answers.text: Frozen is the best movie of all time!
answers.response: I know right?!?
*one does not simply punch a dancing disney nerd*

question: Those are some nice dance moves, man!

answers.response: Haha, yes totally!
Again! Again!
i said... THOSE ARE SOME NICE DANCE MOVES, MAN!
n-no, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean it like that! *friend feels bad*

question: Wow, Ben! Remember me from junior high?! *ridiculously big smile*

answers.response: Don't... remember I changed my name to 'Simba'?

answers.text: Of, course I remember you. You were pee-da-pants-pete! *grins*
answers.response: HAHA, YEAH! THAT'S ME!
*cough* hah, just like old times, huh? *you don't understand why this is happening*

answers.text: Of course! We watched 'The Lion King' like a hundered times!
answers.response: I am glad that you remember me!
